topics.body:
On the subject of homosexuality, when I was younger, I used to kiss other boys. Back then I didn't have any idea what gay or straight meant so you know, I just did it. Being EXTREMELY outgoing when I was younger helped.

Now I think about that and just go "Huh, well that was something I did".
